descriptionHtml:
[img]http://media.moddb.com/cache/images/members/1/532/531406/thumb_620x2000/description.png[/img]
Galadhrim Armor + weapons inspired by the silvan elven armor made by Weta Digital, could be seen in
the Lord of the Rings the Two Towers.

Weapons and armor can be crafted in the elven section in forge.
Capes can be crafted on tanning rack.

Gear stats are balanced and not OP, i would say. (Stats in image section)
Everything except arrows/capes is upgradeable.

[img]http://media.moddb.com/cache/images/members/1/532/531406/thumb_620x2000/important.png[/img]
NON ARGONIAN/KHAJIIT (you can wear it on female characters, but the armor won't fit properly)
(I'm not looking forward to make it for anyone else)

Helmet is actually a circlet, so the hair is visible.
Sword is set as a double handed axe, hence the animations fit better the concept.

Requires Dawnguard to craft arrows.

[img]http://media.moddb.com/cache/images/members/1/532/531406/thumb_620x2000/credits.png[/img]
I'm not a good character creator or screenshot maker so if I can beg you, try to make some nice screens and post them here. You'll of course receive your credits here.

Big thanks to NWaldinger for keeping me motivated!
I used the ApachiiSkyHair for screens and also RealVisionENB
Thanks to renthal311 for his awesome shots.
author: Enpremi
